channel.title: Need great help! good explain please
channel.description:
1. how can i add some more npc's for shops? because if i add a shop it will tele me to edgevillage or i cant trade with it to see what is in the shop :S 2. how cna i make a glow like dragon battle axe special & that otherone special FOR CAMELOT that special dont know what sword it is ... :p in a command so i can us it for mods and admins that they wont attacked if they are glowed 3. how can i set icebarrage that the other one will stand still for like 20 sec and that it will be smaller. 4. how can i set objects in the arena to show where is safe spot and where not :P 5. how can i chanse/add npc monsters??? where do i need to do that or is that te same as with other npc like trade persons??? please if you can tell me where and if you can give the hole code for ice barrage would be easy :) thnx already.
please someone can help me!!!! i need it ;P

item.dc:creator: @anuslikker anuslikker
item.description:
@anuslikker wrote:

kk thnx i edit the npc because it was the wrong kalphite queen.
the ice barrage i dont know if it works now i hope but i still dont know will know soon.
about that shops i have tried it all but it wont work :S can you help me please
and i dont understand what you mean with that you need to add cases voids and everything for that. :S where can i set the command than :S.

btw can you add me on msn? tknechtje@msn.com or someone else who can help me please…

Read full topic
item.source: Need great help! good explain please

item.title: Need great help! good explain please
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

[quote=“anuslikker, post:1, topic:130605”]1. how can i add some more npc’s for shops? because if i add a shop it will tele me to edgevillage or i cant trade with it to see what is in the shop :S
add something like spawn = 2745 3348 9655 0 0 0 0 0 1 jadgame
add that in autospawn.cfg
then add somthing like this is shop’s.cfg

shop = 1	@gre@PKing_@whi@Shop					1	1	4214	2000	3751	2000	3749	2000	3753	3000	3755	2000	1127	2000	1079	2000	1093	2000	1163	2000	4740	2000	5698	2000	7460	2000	7461	5000	5574	500	5575	500	5576	500	3105	5000	6524	5000	6568	5000	6528	2000	7449	2000

then add a wanneshop in client.java…
2. how cna i make a glow like dragon battle axe special & that otherone special FOR CAMELOT that special dont know what sword it is … in a command so i can us it for mods and admins that they wont attacked if they are glowed
you ned to add cases voids and everything for that… it easy its just a copy and paste thing…

  1. how can i set icebarrage that the other one will stand still for like 20 sec and that it will be smaller.
    replace the ice barrage spell with this is client.java

if(magicID == 12891 // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 4); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; startAnimation(1979); highalch(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 0, Lockon); hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex); inCombat(); actionTimer = 20; sendMessage("You poison the enemy!"); } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 94) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }
4. how can i set objects in the arena to show where is safe spot and where not
add somthing like this is client.java

makeGlobalObject(2673, 3402, 6084, -3, 10);//booth
  1. how can i chanse/add npc monsters??? where do i need to do that or is that te same as with other npc like trade persons???
    ive al ready said that… -.- add a wanneshop

please if you can tell me where and if you can give the hole code for ice barrage would be easy thnx already.

please someone can help me!!! i need it ;P[/quote]

Read full topic
